paragraph.heading: 1Locate command
paragraph.paragraph:
The locate command (
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_view_small_color.gif ),located in the
00_introduction.xml cluster tool ,provides an easy way to find a class or a cluster in the
10_cluster_tree.xml cluster tree .
Clicking it automatically expands the clusters containing the edited class or cluster and selects it.

/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml Dropping a class or a cluster on it expands the clusters containing the searched item and selects it.
